### With header

A short sentence that makes a paragraph.

header left  header right
-----------  ------------
left 1       right 1
left 2       right 2
-----------  ------------

### Without header

A short sentence that makes a paragraph.

-----------  ------------
left 1       right 1
left 2       right 2
-----------  ------------

### Md table (w/caption)

A short sentence that makes a paragraph.

| Default | Left | Right | Center |
|---------|:-----|------:|:------:|
| 12      | 12   |    12 |   12   |
| 123     | 123  |   123 |  123   |
| 1       | 1    |     1 |   1    |

: Demonstration of pipe table syntax

### fancy table

A short sentence that makes a paragraph.

| fruit  | price  |
|--------|--------|
| apple  | 2.05   |
| pear   | 1.37   |
| orange | 3.09   |

: Fruit prices {.striped .hover}
